instruction: Find 3 examples of companies who are using analytics to improve customer experience.
output: Three examples of companies that are using analytics to improve the customer experience are Amazon, Netflix, and Adobe. Amazon uses analytics to personalize its website for each user, thereby improving the customer experience. Netflix uses analytics to optimize its content recommendation engine, helping customers find the content they love. And Adobe uses analytics to gain customer insights and improve customer experience through personalized content and customer service.
